activities: HOK receives personal information from its employees and prospective employees in the EU, and may receive personal information of its clients' employees in the EU.  The use of EU personal data will include global enterprise headcount reporting, statistical analysis, compensation planning, and benefits.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: HOK agrees to comply with the EU data protection authorities (DPAs).
